description: Notification from LLDC of application 23/00317/ADV for advertisement consent for the installation of four non-illuminated aluminium signs indicating the location of the ‘North Loading Bay’ and ‘South Loading Bay’ of the Broadcast Centre within the Here East development.
site_name: Broadcast Centre Within The Here East, 2-3
